response.overview: The Hole follows Owen (James), a successful professor living abroad in South Korea, who is bedridden after a devastating car accident that killed his wife, Sandy. He is left under the care of Yuna, his Korean mother-in-law, but when she starts to unravel the devastating truth behind Owen and Sandyâ€™s marriage, and Owen himself, his road to recovery is threatened.
response.title: The Hole (dir. Kim Jee-Woon)
